(Juniper) Zhu Liu
Student at Tsinghua University

I attended Tsinghua University to pursue my Ph.D., supervised by Ying Liu and cosupervised by Maosong Sun. My research topic is computational linguistics, which combines natural languages and computer science. One epistemic problem I am trying to figure out is "What does the machine know and does not know about human languages"? (Issues as E.M.B. proposed). Also, a bidirectional ball always bouncing in my mind - AI for linguistics and linguistics for AI.

Computational Lexical Semantics, Interpretable AI, Semantic Map Models
